name: season_list
description: To list the F1 seasons currently supported by the API.

season.description: A 4 digit integer, the year to search for.

circuit_id.description: The circuit's name to search for.

constructor_id.description: The constructor's name to search for.

driver_id.description: The driver's name to search for.

grid_position.description: The grid position's name to search for.

results_position.description: The results position to search for.

status_id.description: The status Id to search for.

driver_standings.description: The specific driver standing to search for.

constructor_standings.description: The construtor's standing to search for.
